heading: ¡Hello!
title: SOFTWARE DEV
subtitle: Ramiro E. Melero. I transform ideas into digital experiences
textItem1: Explore new digital frontiers: Exceptional app and web projects
step1: I am Full Stack Developer, focused on creating solutions for the digital world.
step2: My profile is both creative and technical with a clear goal: to transform ideas into innovative digital solutions.
step4: My main skills are: Python - PHP - Javascript
step6: Each project is unique, I dedicate all my resources to stand out in a competitive market.
step7: I want the projects I work on to grow and endure, that's why I develop robust and scalable systems.
step8: Agile methodologies help me establish communication and progress in all my projects from the outset.
